movies.Title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.Writer: Leigh Brackett (screenplay), Lawrence Kasdan (screenplay), George Lucas (story by)
movies.Actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
movies.Plot: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.

movies.Title: Rocky
movies.Actors: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
movies.Plot: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a supremely rare chance to fight the heavy-weight champion, Apollo Creed, in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

movies.Title: Warcraft
movies.Writer: Duncan Jones (screenplay), Charles Leavitt (screenplay), Chris Metzen (story and characters)
movies.Actors: Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton, Ben Foster, Clancy Brown
movies.Plot: The peaceful realm of Azeroth stands on the brink of war as its civilization faces a fearsome race of invaders: orc warriors fleeing their dying home to colonize another. As a portal opens ...

movies.Title: Deadpool
movies.Writer: Rhett Reese, Paul Wernick, Fabian Nicieza (character), Rob Liefeld (character)
movies.Actors: Ryan Reynolds, Karan Soni, Ed Skrein, Michael Benyaer
movies.Plot: A former Special Forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopting the alter ego Deadpool.

movies.Title: The Woods
movies.Actors: Callie Hernandez, James Allen McCune, Brandon Scott, Wes Robinson
movies.Plot: Involve a group of college students on a camping trip who discover they are not alone.
